players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Bob was found dead so suddenly. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we can trust everyone in this town."
Charlie: "I think we should all be cautious and keep our identities hidden until more information is available. Let's not jump to conclusions about Charlie just yet."
Diana: "I think we should all be cautious and gather more information before accusing anyone. Let's keep our identities hidden until we have solid evidence."
You: "I believe we should all focus on gathering more information before making any accusations. Let's try to keep an open mind and be cautious in our actions."
